history.proof: intros z H. apply Zeven_def2. apply Zeven_equiv in H. destruct H as [k Hk]. hauto q: on depth: 3use: Z, Zeven_def1.

exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall z : Z, Zeven z -> exists k : Z, z = 2 * k" on hypothesis of type "Z.Even z".
Found no subterm matching "k * 2" in the current goal.
In environment z, k : Z Hk : z = 2 * k Unable to unify "2 * (2 * k)" with "2 * k * 2 * k".

original: intros z H. apply Zeven_def2. apply Zeven_equiv in H. apply Zeven_def1 in H. destruct H as [k Hk]. exists (2 * k). rewrite Hk. rewrite Z.mul_assoc. rewrite (Z.mul_comm k 2). reflexivity.
